it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n

Class Lang

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.bori.jbfw.core.i18n.Lang

  • public class Lang
extends java.lang.Object
    Language object, contains information about single languages file has method for retrieve language word
    Author:
    Andrea Bori

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String lang
      Languages name, can be "it" or "it-IT" for example
      private java.util.Properties langList
      Properties object containing all the key with respective languages value
      private java.lang.String langSource
      languages resource where file it's stored ( do not include extension, and extension must be "i18n" else it will throw LangNotFoundException )

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lang(java.lang.String lang, java.lang.String source)
      Default constructor of the class, require the languages name and it's source.

        Languages name, can be "it" or "it-IT" for example

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lang

        public Lang(java.lang.String lang,
            java.lang.String source)
     throws LangNotFoundException,
            java.io.IOException
        Default constructor of the class, require the languages name and it's source. DO NOT INCLUDE THE EXTENSION inside the langsFile the file MUST have as extension the "i18n"
        Parameters:
        lang - the name of the languages, as example "it" or "it-IT"
        source - the source path where the languages content it's stored, do not include extension, it's must have as extension "i18n"
        Throws:
        LangNotFoundException - throw it if not languages where found at given path
        java.io.IOException - in case parsing is interrupted or something whent wrong

    • Method Detail

      • getWord

        public java.lang.String getWord(java.lang.String word)
                         throws WordNotFoundException
        Get a requested word by a given key
        Parameters:
        word - the requested word, it's a "key" stored inside the file ( unique for all languages with a differed value for each languages )
        Returns:
        the String represented the word founded
        Throws:
        WordNotFoundException - throw it in case it's not found the requested word

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the language
        Returns:
        String name of lang, can be "it" or "it-IT" for example

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path of the file do not include extension, extension MUST be "i18n"
        Returns:
        the source path without extension
